Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a satellite flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Lake Kir is 5.7 km from Studio Le Petit Prince - Centre ville - 2 étoiles, while Zénith de Dijon is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République
description:
Located in the centre of Dijon, just a 3-minute walk from the Place de la République, Aparthotel Adagio Access Dijon République offers a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access throughout. The Fine Arts Museum is a 15-minute walk away.

All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a living area with a TV, a desk and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The fully equipped kitchen includes a microwave, stovetop and refrigerator.

You can prepare homemade meals in the studio or apartment. A buffet breakfast is also served each morning in the property's breakfast room and children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. Guests can also find grocery shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Classed as an eco-friendly building due to its photovoltaic roof, the aparthotel is easily accessible by public transport. The tramway and L3 bus provide direct access to Dijon Train Station, which is 500 metres from Dijon Congrexpo Exhibition Centre. Private parking is available on site at a surcharge.

name: Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Dijon, 5.2 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station, Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The hotel has a terrace and a sauna.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Dijon - Bourgogne Airport Tramway Station is 5.4 km from Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Théâtre : Centre historique
address: 6 Place du Théâtre, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:

The property is situated 3.5 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station, 3.5 km from Universite Tramway Station and 4.7 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Zénith de Dijon is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Quetigny Centre Tramway Station is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 50 km from Le Théâtre: Centre historique.

name: Hôtel République
address: 3 rue du Nord, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
This 18th-century coaching hotel is located in a peaceful street in the historical centre of Dijon. It offers a modern and elegant setting and free Wi-Fi access.

Hotel République features rooms decorated with warm colours to offer a cosy atmosphere. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Guests can relax on the terrace at the République Hotel. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Dijon-Ville Train Station is less than a 15-minute walk away, or a 5-minute tram ride from République Tram Stop. Hotel République is 900 metres from Musee de Beaux-Arts de Dijon and an 8-minute walk from Dijon Cathedral.

name: Le petit Saint Bernard
address: Rez de Chaussée 15 Rue d'Ahuy, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Situated in Dijon and only 1.2 km from Dijon Train Station, Le petit Saint Bernard features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 1.4 km from Dijon Congrexpo, less than 1 km from Saint-Philibert Church and 4 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Universite Tramway Station is 4.3 km from Le petit Saint Bernard, while Zénith de Dijon is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

name: Cosy T2 38m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon- Gare/Darcy
description:
Cosy T2 38m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon- Gare/Darcy is situated in Dijon, 300 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, as well as 2 km from Dijon Congrexpo. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 300 metres from Dijon Train Station. The property features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Lake Kir is 4.4 km from the apartment, while CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from Cosy T2 38m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon- Gare/Darcy.

name: Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers
address: 3/5, rue Turgot, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers is located in the historic centre of Dijon. The aparthotel offers en suite rooms and self-catering accommodations. Guests can relax in the garden or in the steam bath.

All of the accommodations at Odalys City Dijon Les Cordeliers have a private shower room with free toiletries and hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access and a cable TV are also available.

The apartments have an equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and an electric kettle. Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The property is 500 metres from the Palais des Ducs and Fines Arts Museum, and 1.50 km from Dijon ville train station. Dijon Congrexpo is 1.5 km away.

name: Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy
description:
Offering city views, Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy is an accommodation located in Dijon, 300 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station and 700 metres from Saint-Philibert Church. Among the facilities at this property are a minimarket and bicycle parking, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Dijon Train Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Dijon, like fishing. Outdoor play equipment is also available at Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Dijon Congrexpo is 2 km from the accommodation, while Lake Kir is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from Cosy T2 31m2 - Centre-Ville Dijon - Gare et Darcy.

name: B&B des Marcs d'Or
address: 7 rue des Marcs d'or, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Boasting free bikes and views of inner courtyard, B&B des Marcs d'Or is a bed and breakfast set in a historic building in Dijon, 2.7 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station. This bed and breakfast features free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with streaming services.

Some units in the bed and breakfast have private entrance and are fitted with wardrobe and dressing room. Every unit comes with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Saint-Philibert Church is 3.2 km from the bed and breakfast, while Dijon Train Station is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 52 km from B&B des Marcs d'Or.

name: Nomad Hotel Dijon
description:
Set in Dijon, 300 metres from Dijon Train Station, Nomad Hotel Dijon features accommodation with a bar and private parking. All rooms boast a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The hotel offers an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFithroughout the property.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the hotel.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 300 metres from Nomad Hotel Dijon, while Saint-Philibert Church is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Marechal - 1 minute de la gare
description:
Le Marechal - 1 minute de la gare is set in Dijon, 100 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, 600 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, and 2.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo. The property is around 4.4 km from Lake Kir, 4.6 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station and 4.6 km from Universite Tramway Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Dijon Train Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Zénith de Dijon is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dijon Bourgogne Airport, 7 km from Le Marechal - 1 minute de la gare.

name: City Loft Apparthotel
address: 96 rue des Godrans, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Ideally located in the heart of the pedestrian quarter, close to the Palais des Ducs.

Formerly known as the Au Pauvre Diable shop, the building houses 53 nicely furnished apartments ranging from single to quadruple. Every apartment is equipped with air-conditioning, a full kitchenette with hot hobs, fridge and microwave, a safe and a television.

While in Dijon, make sure you take some time to discover the city's famous products such as its mustard, gingerbread and blackcurrant liquor. The city also houses an auditorium and a famous university.

name: Hôtel des Ducs
address: 5, rue Lamonnoye, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

name: La canopée Dijonnaise Confort Centre Ville
address: 3 éme étage 50 Rue Berbisey, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Set in Dijon, 1.1 km from Dijon Train Station and less than 1 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station, La canopée Dijonnaise Confort Centre Ville offers air conditioning. The property is situated 2 km from Dijon Congrexpo, 3.6 km from Universite Tramway Station and 3.9 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Saint-Philibert Church is 400 metres away.

This apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Lake Kir is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Dijon Bourgogne Airport, 6 km from La canopée Dijonnaise Confort Centre Ville.

name: Le Petit Hernoux Centre historique
address: 5 Rue Hernoux, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Le Petit Hernoux Centre historique is set in the Old Town district of Dijon, 1.7 km from Dijon Congrexpo, 1.2 km from Dijon Train Station and 1.2 km from Foch-Gare Tramway Station. The property is situated 3.5 km from Universite Tramway Station, 3.6 km from CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station and 4.7 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Saint-Philibert Church is 600 metres away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Zénith de Dijon is 5.3 km from Le Petit Hernoux Centre historique, while Quetigny Centre Tramway Station is 5.5 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: Monseigneur Dijon central & design avec parking
description:
Located in Dijon and only 700 metres from Dijon Train Station, Monseigneur Dijon central & design avec parking provides accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is set 1.1 km from Saint-Philibert Church, 2.3 km from Dijon Congrexpo and 4.9 km from Lake Kir. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Foch-Gare Tramway Station.

The recently renovated apartment is equipped with 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. The property offers quiet street views.

CHU - Hopitaux Tramway Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Universite Tramway Station is 5.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 52 km from Monseigneur Dijon central & design avec parking.

name: Hôtel des Halles
description:
Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access. The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away. The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University. Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

name: L'Annexe Apparthôtel du 11 A, 4 étoiles
description:
Located in the historical centre of Besançon, in the Franche-Comté region, L'Annexe du 11A offers a self-catering apartment in an 18th-century mansion. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the property.

The elegant apartment features a private bathroom, a kitchen with dishwasher, oven, fridge and stove, and a dining area. Additional facilities include a washing machine, a DVD-player, free landlines calls to 104 countries and a photocopy machine, available upon request.

A breakfast package is available upon request, and local cafes and restaurants surround the apartment.

With both the Vauban Citadel and Saint-Jean Cathedral 750 and 260 metres away, L'Annexe du 11A provides private parking at an extra cost. The city centre shopping area and museums can be found around the property.

name: Chambre d'hôtes Le Petit Tertre
address: 41 Rue Verrerie, Dijon Centre Ville, 21000 Dijon, France
description:
Le Petit Tertre is located in the centre of Dijon, a 3-minute walk from the Palace of the Dukes of Burgundy and offers free Wi-Fi.

All apartments are fully furnished in an 18th century style. The Apartment-Empire has views of the courtyard and is decorated in a Napoléon style.

Guests can have breakfast in their room.

This property is a short walk from the Musée des Beaux Arts de Dijon and the Notre Dame church.

name: Le Select - Hypercentre Standing Wifi
description:
Le Select - Hypercentre Standing Wifi offers accommodation set 500 metres from the centre of Besançon and features a garden and a terrace. It is situated 1.3 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and provides private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Besancon Viotte Train Station is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with inner courtyard views. This apartment also has a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon, Time museum of Besançon and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Le Select - Hypercentre Standing Wifi.

name: Le New York Bisontin
description:
Set in Besançon and only 500 metres from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Le New York Bisontin features accommodation with quiet street views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 4.9 km from Micropolis, 11 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 2.8 km from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The property is soundproof and is located 1.8 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Le New York Bisontin include Time museum of Besançon, Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon and Besançon City Hall. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 62 km from the accommodation.

name: La Petite Sommière
address: 5 bis Chemin des Verjoulots, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
Boasting a garden and views of garden, La Petite Sommière is a recently renovated apartment set in Besançon, 1.6 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station. The property has city and quiet street views, and is 3.6 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Outdoor seating allows guests to sit outside and enjoy the good weather.

Units feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, toaster, coffee machine and kettle. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Micropolis is 8.1 km from the apartment, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 65 km from La Petite Sommière.

name: ibis Besançon Centre Ville
description:
Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Vauban
description:
Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon. It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban.  The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

name: Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville
description:
Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville is set in Besançon, 6.6 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
address: 6, Rue de La Viotte, 25000 Besançon, France
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Hotel Restaurant Vesontio
description:
Located 5 km from the centre of Besançon and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, Hotel restaurant Vesontio offers an air-conditioned restaurant and a meeting room. Free WiFi is available throughout. Besançon Tennis Club is 3.1 km away from the property.

Decorated in bright colours, rooms are equipped with satellite TV, a desk and a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer,

A buffet breakfast made with local produce is served every morning at this hotel, which you can also enjoy on the terrace. For lunch and dinner, homemade dishes are served.

Free private parking is possible on site and a garage is also available upon request. Easily accessible via the RN57 road and the A36 motorway, the hotel is 3 km from the Viotte Train Station and 10 minutes from the Besançon Franche-Comté Train Station.

name: Hôtel AKENA BESANCON
description:
Situated in Besançon, 16 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Hôtel AKENA BESANCON features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. Built in 2018, this 3-star hotel is within 17 km of Besançon-Mouillère train station and 17 km of Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk as well as free WiFithroughout the property.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms at Hôtel AKENA BESANCON have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon is 13 km from the accommodation, while Isis aquatic park is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 48 km from Hôtel AKENA BESANCON.

name: Logement tout confort avec jardin proche centre
description:
Featuring a spa bath, Logement tout confort avec jardin proche centre is set in Besançon. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Besancon Viotte Train Station, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Logement tout confort avec jardin proche centre.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls. It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

name: Appartement très calme, terrasse & jardin en ville
description:
Boasting a patio with garden views, a garden and a bar, Appartement très calme, terrasse & jardin en ville can be found in Besançon, close to Besancon Viotte Train Station and 3.3 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.8 km from Micropolis.

Featuring a Nintendo Wii, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a shower. A flat-screen TV with streaming services and a game console are available. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Time museum of Besançon, Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from Appartement très calme, terrasse & jardin en ville.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
address: 3 Chemin des Trois Croix, 25480 Besançon, France

description:
This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning.

Free parking is available on site and the city of Avranches is 23 km away. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from the beaches of Saint-Malo and Rennes is reached by car in 1 hour.

Decorated in a traditional style, the guest rooms all have a TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms also offer a view of Mont Saint-Michel.

Breakfast is taken in the large dining room at this B&B.  Kitchen facilities including a microwave and a fridge-freezer are at your disposal, and free Wi-Fi access is provided in the communal areas.

With free private parking, this property is 4 km from the car parks of Mont Saint-Michel. Carolles Beach is 25 km away and you can enjoy oysters in Cancale, 35 km away.

Overlooking the garden, units in this bed and breakfast are accessible via private entrance and fitted with a TV and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. There is also a dressing room equipped with storage space for your clothing. The units include bed linen.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Pontorson, like cycling, hiking and walking tours.

Mont Saint Michel Abbey is 8.1 km from Vent des Grèves, while Mont Saint-Michel is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 93 km from the accommodation.

Housed in a building dating from 18th century, this bed and breakfast is 43 km from Champrepus Zoo and 46 km from Fougères Castle. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit includes a private bathroom.

At the bed and breakfast, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and high tea and serves Grill BBQ cuisine.

The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 90 km from Le Marquis De La Guintre.

name: La Jacotière

Situated in Ardevon, La Jacotière is a B&B set in a renovated farm with a garden and a furnished terrace offering views of the Mont Saint-Michel, just 3 km away. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

The rooms offer a TV, a desk and wardrobe and a private bathroom with shower. The studio also has a kitchen equipped with microwave and stove.

Breakfast is served in the large dining room. Supermarkets, bars and restaurants serving traditional and international cuisine can be found a 5-minute walk away.

At the B&B, guests have access to guides on excursions to do in the area. There are shuttle services nearby to discover the Mont Saint-Michel. Pontorson Train Station is 8.5 km away, while Saint-Malo and Granville are 46 km away.

name: Chambres d'Hôtes Les Vieilles Digues
address: Route du Mont Saint Michel, 50170 Beauvoir, France
description:
Set in a renovated Breton-style house, this family-run B&B is located in Beauvoir, 3 km from Mont-Saint-Michel. With a 3000-m2 flowered park, it features en suite rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi.

All with a private entrance, the elegant rooms at Les Vieilles Digues have free toiletries. Those on the ground floor include French doors with direct access to the patio, which has deck chairs.

The breakfast includes hot drinks, orange juice, yogurt, cheese and cereals and fresh baguettes are delivered daily by the local baker. The owners are at guests’ disposal for advising good restaurants nearby.

Guests are invited to have a walk or a ride along Le Couesnon River, which is 200 metres from Les Vieilles Digues. Saint-Malo and Cancale are a 45-minute drive and Pontorson Train Station is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Etoile des Grèves

The property features garden and quiet street views, and is 8.1 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At the bed and breakfast, all units are soundproof. All units will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the buffet breakfast.

After a day of cycling, hiking or walking tours, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 93 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Chez Adèle
address: La Truie Qui File, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Set 200 metres from Mont Saint-Michel and providing water sports facilities, Chez Adèle offers accommodation in Le Mont Saint Michel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

The holiday home is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

name: Hôtel la Croix Blanche
address: grande rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche offers a terrace and a bar.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel. Dol-de-Bretagne Train Station is 30 km away.

name: Le Saint Aubert
address: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

name: Auberge Saint Pierre
address: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Auberge Saint Pierre is a 14th-century half-timbered house located on Mont St Michel tidal island. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts including TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The guest rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms have views of the sea.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Normandy cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and guests may choose to dine on site.

Ideally situated for visiting Mont St Michel, this hotel is set on the main street that leads to the Mont Saint Michel abbey. Certain rooms are located in 2 separate buildings which are accessible by many stairs.

name: Hôtel Vert
address: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

name: Hotel Gabriel
address: Route du Mont Saint Michel, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV. Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine and L'Hippocampe offers you vegetarian and local cuisine.

name: Le Mouton Blanc
address: Grande Rue , 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed. Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

name: La Mère Poulard
address: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel. The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant. A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

The hotel has a shop selling regional gourmet products. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel. Avranches is a 23-minute drive away. Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

name: Les Terrasses Poulard
address: Grande Rue, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France
description:
Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
address: La Caserne, 50170 Le Mont Saint Michel, France

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and the hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Biarritz, this seafront hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from the beach. Guests can access this property's sea water heated swimming pool and the spa centre situated just 150 metres away. Its rooms overlook the sea or the city.

All of the air-conditioned rooms at Le Biarritz are equipped with a flat-screen TV and an elegant bathroom with a walk-in shower. Free WiFi is available in the entire building.

Guests of Hotel Le Biarritz have acces to the nearby spa an extra cost, Thalmar, which features a sea water pool, sauna, hammam and fitness centre. Beauty treatments are at an extra cost.

The hotel’s restaurant, Le Ponton, serves traditional cuisine, prepared with seasonal produce.  During the summer guests can dine on its terrace with views of the surrounding area.

The Pyrenees Mountains are a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Free public parking is available on site, for guests who wish to explore the Basque region by car.

Castle of Flaugergues is 30 km from the guest house, while Peyrou Triumphal Arch is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Marcelle en Camargue.

name: Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz
description:

It has soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. Each elegantly designed room has an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and views of the sea, the town or the courtyard.

Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site.

A public car park is available 50 metres from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Centre.

name: Chambre et jardin
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Chambre et jardin is situated in Bayonne, 25 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 26 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 15 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

Hendaye Train Station is 39 km from the bed and breakfast, while FICOBA is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 11 km from Chambre et jardin.

name: Temporesidence Cathedrale
description:
Located in Bayonne, Temporesidence Cathedrale is just 2.5 km from the train station and 6 km from Biarritz. It offers spacious apartments and studios with a fully equipped kitchenette.

All of the soundproof apartments and studios feature an LCD cable TV and a separate seating area. Each has a microwave, fridge and hotplates to prepare meals which can then be eaten in the dining area. The Wifi system of the entire residence was completely updated in June 2022 with access to high-speed optical fiber.

All of the rooms at Temporesidence Cathedrale are serviced by a lift and the residence also has laundry facilities and luggage storage. Public parking is available at a nearby location.

Local activities include hiking and the town offers many attractions such as Bayonne castle, the Basque Museum and Saint André’s Church.

name: Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre
description:
Set in Bayonne, just 700 metres from the city centre and Ste Marie Cathedral, Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and subject to availability.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Bayonne Arenes Bullring is 600 metres away and Ansot Park just 1.6 km away. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre L’Okko is located 5 km from the Ocean beaches. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Bayonne en plein cœur Centre Historique 2 chambres
address: 1er étage gauche 32 Rue des Basques, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Offering city views, Bayonne en plein cœur Centre Historique 2 chambres is an accommodation set in Bayonne, 400 metres from Saint Marie Cathedral and 3.4 km from Ansot Park. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The 2-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 9.2 km from Bayonne en plein cœur Centre Historique 2 chambres, while Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: La Chambre d'Hote de Mano - Centre-ville de Bayonne
description:
Located 200 metres from Bayonne Train Station, less than a 2-minute walk from the Adour River bank and 1 km from the Cathedral, Chambre d'Hôtes de Bayonne France offers a bedroom in an apartment.

The room offers free WiFi access as well as hot drink making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is available at the week end at an extra cost, upon prior request. Guests can will find various restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. A few steps away, guests can find local food stores.

Ansot Park is just 1.7 km away and Jardin Botanique is 600 metres from the property. Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport is 5 km away. Public parking is available.

name: ibis Bayonne Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Bayonne, this ibis hotel is set on the banks of the Adour River, just 600 metres from the train station. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms and a furnished terrace.

The rooms at ibis Bayonne have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and a lift. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this property. Private parking is possible on site, with an additional cost, and Biarritz Parme Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

Please note that we accept pets except on the restaurant

name: Agréable T2 Bayonne à côté du centre ville et de la gare
description:
Agréable T2 Bayonne à côté du centre ville et de la gare is located in Bayonne, 1.5 km from Saint Marie Cathedral, 4.1 km from Ansot Park, and 10 km from Rock of the Blessed Virgin. The apartment is 500 metres from Gare de Bayonne. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 16 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 6 km from Agréable T2 Bayonne à côté du centre ville et de la gare.

name: ibis Styles Bayonne
address: 1 place de la République, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Located on the banks of the Adour River with an exceptional view of the medieval town of Bayonne, ibis Styles Bayonne is within walking distance of the 12th-Century Cathedral.

All of the 45 rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned, equipped with en suite facilities and include central heating and flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi access and breakfast are included.

The 5 floors of the hotel are serviced by a lift. On the ground floor guests can enjoy light meals 24 hours a day.

The ibis Styles Bayonne is easily accessible from the A63 motorway. It is situated just 50 metres from Bayonne Train Station and just 200 metres from the historic city centre. It is 8 km from the airport and 35 km from the Spanish border. Guests can find public parking at an extra cost at the Train Station. Outdoor Parking spaces, which are free from 18:00 to 09:00, can be found close the property, on the river side. Direct access in front of the hotel by "Rue Neuve".

name: Hôtel Le Bayonne
description:
Set in central Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Hôtel Le Bayonne offers a seasonal, outdoor swimming pool. Guests are invited to use the hammam.

Free fibre-optic Internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are provided in each of Hôtel Le Bayonne rooms. They are all air-conditioned and include work desks and telephones.

Traditional cuisine is proposed in the restaurant at Hôtel Le Bayonne, and drinks are served in the bar. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

Bayonne Train Station is 3 km away and private parking is available with a supplement. The hotel is 7.6 km from Biarritz and 5.5 km from the Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport.

name: Libertitu
address: 44 avenue Maréchal Foch, double porte de gauche PAYS BASQUE, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Set within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and less than 1 km of Saint Marie Cathedral in Bayonne, Libertitu features accommodation with seating area. This 3-star bed and breakfast offers a lift, a housekeeping service and free WiFi. Pyrenees Atlantiques Prefecture  is 300 metres from the bed and breakfast.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service is also available.

Ansot Park is 3.1 km from the bed and breakfast, while Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 8.5 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz, 5 km from Libertitu, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne
description:
Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Bayonne. This property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available every morning at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

The accommodation offers a sauna. Guests at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and cycling.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Saint Marie Cathedral, Ansot Park and Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 7 km from Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

name: Appartement T2 cosy et calme
address: 28 Rue des Sœurs Blanches, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Appartement T2 cosy et calme is located in Bayonne, 11 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 2.5 km from Saint Marie Cathedral, and 4.5 km from Ansot Park. Located around 9.2 km from Rock of the Blessed Virgin, the apartment is also 1.6 km away from Kedge Business School Bayonne Campus. There is a terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

This apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. This apartment also features a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 7 km from the apartment.

name: Joli Duplex à quelques pas du centre de Bayonne
description:
Joli Duplex à quelques pas du centre de Bayonne is set in Bayonne, 1.8 km from Saint Marie Cathedral, 5 km from Ansot Park, as well as 11 km from Rock of the Blessed Virgin. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 15 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Jardin Botanique is 70 metres from the apartment. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 10 km from Joli Duplex à quelques pas du centre de Bayonne.

name: Mendiska
address: 8 Rue Docteur André Vidal, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Mendiska has a terrace and is located in Bayonne, within just 1.9 km of Saint Marie Cathedral and 1.6 km of Bayonne High Court. Set 2.8 km from Ansot Park, the property provides a garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 5.9 km away.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 6.6 km from the bed and breakfast. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Mendiska.

name: Hotel Cote Basque
description:
This hotel sits in the heart Bayonne’s historical town, in front of the Saint Esprit bridge. It offers free Wi-Fi and en suite rooms.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Cote Basque are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning and are accessible by lift. Hairdryers can be requested.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning.

The hotel is 100 metres from Bayonne train station,  5 km from Biarritz and 30 km from San Sebastien. A public car park is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Temporesidence Chateauneuf
description:
Located in the Aquitaine region, this residence features modern accommodation with wired internet access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The sandy beaches of Biarritz are just 8 km away.

The soundproofed accommodations feature a seating and dining area. The kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. All accommodations have a private bathroom.

The Temporesidence Chateauneuf is set in the lively historic centre and Bayonne Train Station is 1 km away. Saint André Church is 210 metres from the residence. Public parking is available nearby.

The entire residence’s Wi-Fi system was fully updated in June 2022 with access to broadband fibre optic.

name: ibis budget Bayonne
address: 6 avenue du Grand Basque, 64100 Bayonne, France
description:
Located 2 km from Bayonne historic centre and train station, and 8 km from the beaches, ibis budget Bayonne has a 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi and free parking.

The air-conditioned rooms all have a private shower room. Pets are welcomed at the property yet an additional fee of 10 EUR per animal per night will apply.

There is a Courtepaille Restaurant on site offering traditional food and a grill on the terrace. A continental breakfast can be served in the breakfast room or on the terrace and includes pastries, fruit juice, brioche, cake, yogurts, compote, cheese and hot drinks.

Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 7 km from ibis budget Bayonne and the A63 highway is 500 metres away. The Basque Museum is 2 km away.

name: Hotel Le Port Neuf
description:
Hotel Le Port Neuf is located in the historical centre, 100 metres from Bayonne Cathedral and 300 metres from the Basque Museum. It offers free Wi-Fi access and an onsite bar with a terrace.

The rooms at Hotel Le Port Neuf are decorated in a contemporary style and include a flat-screen TV. There is also an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served every morning from 8:00 to 10.00, and local gastronomic restaurants can be found 300 metres from the property. The property also boasts an on-sit wine bar.

The hotel is also ideally located a 10-minute walk from the train station.

name: Hôtel des Arceaux
description:
Set in a pedestrianised area of Bayonne’s historical centre, this charming hotel is housed in a 17th-century building. All the rooms are uniquely decorated and include free WiFi internet access.

Some rooms feature a private bathroom while other have access to a shared bathroom and toilet.

You can reach the attractions of Bayonne on foot thanks to the central location of the Hôtel des Arceaux.

The hotel is ideal for exploring the Basque country. Explore the mountains, beaches and countryside in the area surrounding the Hôtel des Arceaux.

name: Parc 709 Bayonne
description:
Offering quiet street views, Parc 709 Bayonne is an accommodation set in Bayonne, less than 1 km from Saint Marie Cathedral and 3 km from Ansot Park. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with river views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 8.5 km from the apartment, while Pyrenees Atlantiques Prefecture  is 300 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 6 km from Parc 709 Bayonne.

name: Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR
description:
Located within 12 km of Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 300 metres of Saint Marie Cathedral in Bayonne, Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR provides accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include a safety deposit box.

A selection of options including fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and walking tours.

Ansot Park is 3.4 km from Maison d'hôtes City Break MIRADOUR, while Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Studio LOREAK au cœur du centre ville de Bayonne
description:
Located in Bayonne, Studio LOREAK au cœur du centre ville de Bayonne is a recently renovated accommodation, 12 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 22 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. The property features inner courtyard views and is 36 km from Hendaye Train Station and 36 km from FICOBA. The property is non-smoking and is set 22 km from Saint-Jean-Baptiste Church.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like walking tours.

Pasaiako portua is 48 km from Studio LOREAK au cœur du centre ville de Bayonne. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Studio Super Privé by Interhome
description:
Located in Biarritz, near Grande Plage, Plage Miramar and Biarritz Media Centre, Studio Super Privé by Interhome features a garden. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Plage Pêcheurs.

The apartment is equipped with a TV. The kitchenette has an oven, a microwave and a fridge, as well as coffee machine.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 2 km from Studio Super Privé by Interhome.

name: Hôtel Le Café de Paris
description:
Hôtel Le Café de Paris is in central Biarritz, on the pedestrian Place Bellevue and a 5-minute walk from the Halls. All the rooms have panoramic views of the sea.

All rooms are equipped with en suite Italian ceramic bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite and Canal+ channels and free Wi-Fi.

Guests can sample refined cuisine in Hôtel Le Café de Paris’ restaurant, which hasa menu elaborated by the Michelin-starred chef Cédric Béchade. The restaurant offers an outdoor terrace overlooking the Place Bellevue and the sea.

name: Charming and spacious apartment in Biarritz - Welkeys
address: 20 rue Jules Ferry Apt, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
In the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, close to Grande Plage, Charming and spacious apartment in Biarritz - Welkeys features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 3.1 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 17 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 7.2 km from Saint Marie Cathedral. The property is less than 1 km from Plage Pêcheurs, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plage Miramar, Rock of the Blessed Virgin and Biarritz Media Centre. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 2 km from Charming and spacious apartment in Biarritz - Welkeys.

name: Nice & calm studio w balcony in Beaurivage district in Biarritz - Welkeys
description:
Nice & calm studio w balcony in Beaurivage district in Biarritz - Welkeys has a balcony and is situated in Biarritz, within just 1 km of Plage Port Vieux and 1.1 km of Plage Pêcheurs. It is located 3.4 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Cote des Basques Beach is 700 metres away.

The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 18 km from the apartment, while Rock of the Blessed Virgin is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from Nice & calm studio w balcony in Beaurivage district in Biarritz - Welkeys.

name: Ama Hôtel
description:
Designed by the famous Basque architect Raymond Larrebat Tudor and built in the 18th-century, Ama Hôtel is a lovely residence in the heart of Biarritz.

It is ideally situated 200 metres from the beach and casino and close to the local thalassotherapy centre.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

Public parking is available just 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Jules Verne, BW Signature Collection
description:
The hotel is located in central Biarritz, near the Palais des Festivals, the casino and the local beaches. Guests are invited to use the heated outdoor swimming pool.

All the modern rooms at the Hôtel Jules Verne are air-conditioned and soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite. Free Wi-Fi is provided and adjoining rooms are available on request.

Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the comfort of guest rooms and a Nespresso coffee machine is available in some rooms.

The friendly and attentive staff at the hotel will be happy to help you organise your stay in Biarritz 24 hours a day. Parking in a garage s available with an extra cost.

name: Le Gamaritz
address: 5 Perspective de la Côte des Basques, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Le Gamaritz is located in Biarritz city centre, just a 2-minute walk from the Port Vieux beach. It offers design, air-conditioned accommodations with a walk-in shower, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

Guests of Hotel Le Gamaritz can enjoy breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace, at an extra cost. Some restaurants and tapas bars can be found in the area.

The Gamaritz is 6 km from the A63 motorway. It is 700 metres from the Biarritz Barriere Casino and a 10-minute drive from Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport and Biarritz Train Station.

name: Appartement mignon, plein centre
description:
Set in Biarritz, near Plage Port Vieux, Plage Pêcheurs and Rock of the Blessed Virgin, Appartement mignon, plein centre features free WiFi. The property is around 3.7 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station, 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station and 10 km from Saint Marie Cathedral. The property is 300 metres from Cote des Basques Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Monte Ulía is 50 km from the apartment, while Villa Belza is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 4 km from Appartement mignon, plein centre.

name: Best Western Kemaris
address: 35 Avenue du Maréchal Joffre, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Blending vibrant surroundings, a host of facilities and an inviting ambience, the Best Western Kemaris hotel features typical architecture of the Basque Country.

Bright and spacious, the guest rooms of the Kemaris boast a sophisticated decor and a host of modern comforts, with a flat-screen television and free Wi-Fi access. Each room offers a beautiful decor blending design and natural touches, and some of them also come with large terrace.

A buffet breakfast consisting of regional products is prepared every morning at this hotel, and you can enjoy a drink from the bar.

The Kemaris Best Western has a privileged location from which to fully discover by foot the city of Biarritz, and there are many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Private on-site parking is available upon reservation.

name: Hotel Edouard VII
description:
Just 5 minutes walking distance from the Biarritz beaches, sits Hotel Edouard VII, a 19th-century residence that combines the charm of yesterday and the comfort of today.

This unique residence has a rich history based on its past residents. It was once the home of the Mayor of Biarritz. It was also the place Napoleon III used to receive medical care on his visits to the region.

Guestrooms are spacious and feature a refined and elegant décor. All are air-conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with private bathrooms, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet access.

The area surrounding Hotel Edouard VII has much to offer. In addition to the beautiful coast and its beaches, you will find restaurants, shops, museums and casinos. San Sebastien is only a 45-minute drive away.

name: Rivage YourHostHelper
description:
Rivage YourHostHelper is set in Biarritz, 500 metres from Grande Plage, 600 metres from VVF Beach, and 4.1 km from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station. The property is located 18 km from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station, 2 km from Rock of the Blessed Virgin and 8.3 km from Saint Marie Cathedral. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Plage Miramar.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Monte Ulía is 50 km from the apartment, while Monte Urgull is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 4 km from Rivage YourHostHelper.

name: Hôtel PALMITO
address: 7 rue du Port Vieux , 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Set in the Old Town in Biarritz, this non-smoking hotel is located just 100 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV are provided in the guest rooms.

A glimpse of the sea or the courtyard is offered in each room, and some rooms feature a balcony. All of the rooms have a private bathroom, and some have a walk-in shower.

You can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast while reading the newspapers provided.

Biarritz Barrière Casino is just 700 metres from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 4 km away. Restaurants, bars and nightclubs are located 50 metres away.

name: Résidence Vacances Bleues Le Grand Large
description:
Offering panoramic views of Biarritz Cote des Basques Beach and a heated outdoor swimming pool, Le Grand Large is an aparthotel situated in the heart of Biarritz, just 200 metres from the Old Harbour with various stores, local markets and tapas bars nearby.

The spacious studios at the Le Grand Large feature a loggia with blades viewing the Ocean or the Lighthouse. They all are equipped with a modern private bathroom and a complete kitchenette with ceramic hob.

A continental buffet breakfast is available.

This aparthotel is less than a 5-minute walk from Cote des Basques Beach. Within 3 km, guests can enjoy Biarritz Golf and Bidart Golf. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 4 km away.

name: Chambre d'Hôtes Arima
address: 13 Bis, avenue du Parc Bon Air, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Located just 1 km from the centre of Biarritz, Chambre d’Hôtes Arima offers an outdoor, salt water swimming pool and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. The beach is just a 10-minute drive away.

Accessed by a private entrance, all rooms feature a garden, pool and as well as a private bathroom.
The establishment has a summer kitchen with free access.


A continental breakfast serving yogurt, fruit juice, homemade fruit salad and pastries is available each morning. Guests can find gastronomic and traditional restaurants within 500 metres of the property.
Thalasso therapy centres are accessible close to the establishment.

There is a golf course as well as walking and cycling paths just 3 km away. Additional features include a large garden, free Wi-Fi access and free public parking at a location nearby.

name: Outsite Coliving Biarritz
description:
Set in Biarritz and with Cote des Basques Beach reachable within 600 metres, Outsite Coliving Biarritz offers a terrace, allergy-free rooms, free WiFithroughout the property and a shared lounge. Boasting water sports facilities, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 800 metres from Plage Pêcheurs, 2 km from Plage Marbella and 1 km from Rock of the Blessed Virgin. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Grande Plage.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms also offer a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 3.5 km from Outsite Coliving Biarritz, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel de La Plage
address: 3, esplanade du Port Vieux, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Situated in Biarritz and facing the ocean, Hôtel de La Plage offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access just 50 metres from the Plage du Vieux Port. The train station is located a 10-minute drive away.

The rooms at Hôtel de La Plage have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have a view of the sea. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. All type of restaurants can be found within 150 metres.

The hotel is a 5-minuted rive from the centre of Biarritz and 15 km from Saint-Jean de Luz. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is situated a 10-minute drive away.

name: Bellevue 766 Biarritz
address: 2 Place Bellevue, Résidence Bellevue - Clémenceau - Entrée A2, 64200 Biarritz, France
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Bellevue 766 Biarritz is an accommodation set right in the centre of Biarritz, just 100 metres from Grande Plage and 200 metres from Plage Pêcheurs. Situated on the beachfront, this property has a casino. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Cote des Basques Beach.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Biarritz La Négresse Train Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Saint Jean de Luz Train Station is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from Bellevue 766 Biarritz.

name: Hôtel Cosmopolitain
description:
Located 700 metres from the Rock of the Blessed Virgin and just 200 metres from the beach in central Biarritz, Hôtel Cosmopolitain is a  3-star hotel featuring elegantly decorated guest rooms and common areas.

Hôtel Cosmopolitain also offers free Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom and satellite TV in each.

Lunch is available and guests can enjoy a cocktail or a glass of champagne in the hotel bar.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around Hôtel Cosmopolitain. The Sea and Chocolate Museum are 1 km away and the hotel is a 10-minute drive from Biarritz airport and SNCF Train Station.

name: Canopée Biarritz centre plage
description:
In the Biarritz City Centre district of Biarritz, close to Plage Pêcheurs, Canopée Biarritz centre plage features free WiFi and a washing machine. After your getaways, you will be delighted to refresh yourself on the terrace of our café around a local drink, a snack or an ice cream in a friendly atmosphere.

During your stay, we invite you to rest and relax as well as to explore our beautiful Camargue.
